review_data.title: Take a magical tour with your taste receptors
review_data.content: Unbelievable experience to the world of completely new flavours. Top of the notch service and atmosphere. Not your everyday usual place and i mean it only in a positive way. Try it, or you wont even know what life has to offer.

review_data.title: Ein einmaliges Erlebnis!
review_data.content: Ein einmaliges Erlebnis! Wer etwas aussergewöhnliches sucht ist hier genau richtig. Sich verwöhnen lassen in heimeliger Atmosphäre.

review_data.title: Good but far too expensive

review_data.title: Great food and amazing hosts!
review_data.content: Had a fabulous evening at f39: wine pairing was excellent, the hosts were very very friendly and the food was amazing (even though unconventional). Highly recommended :)

review_data.title: Lovely!
review_data.content: The owners of this restaurant are very conscious about the ingredients and dishes that they create, it is very inspiring. Every dish is made carefully, with a lot of thought put into it. I love the atmosphere, I love the food.

review_data.title: A hidden gem!
review_data.content: A fresh breeze in the Zurich food scene. Food is modern, delicious and inspiring. Amazing minimalist style and cosy atmosphere. Very friendly service staff and cook (the owners). It is worth every francs!

review_data.title: Great food and friendly service
review_data.content: Great food and definitively one of the best services we had in Zurich in many years. Benjamin and his partner make each evening different and to remember.

review_data.title: Alles stimmt!

review_data.content: Unbedingt hingehen! Die beiden Jungs kochen mit viel Herzblut und verstehen ihr Handwerk. Alles regional und saisonal. Top Weinbegleitung dazu.

review_data.title: Great food and ambience
